title: from the mouths of fashionistas
text:
September 4, 2014Dapper Dexterity

			From the mouths of Fashionistas
		
		Thought I would share something I stumbled on to the other day while looking for a new Dapper Dexterity quote.
The the 101 Best Fashion Quotes Of All Time, apparently. Now, I don’t know that they are the best, and especially of all time, but they’re pretty darn good.
 
Here are some of my favourites:

                                                               
If you would care to read the remaining 91 you can simply go here
Okay. Stay fancy.
